data.text: Masagi Lemuwɛle laawooiti. Kalagiti dee ti woni da.
Lee ɠa nà bo è ma, dòun zunu?
Mina è-zuvikɛi ve anzanuiti zea,31:3 Nii ɠa ɓɔɛzu, é ʋilɛ anza ʋɛlɛi wu anzanu mɔinmɔingiti ba masa pɛlɛi wu, niiti ta la zoo ti masagi zeɠe siɛ ʋele ʋa.
É la zolooni masagiti ma, Lemuwɛle,
Mazɔlɔɔ a ti zona, ti mina yeema tɔgi laawooiti ma,
Nu gaazulati kpɔle anii ve naa ya, nii undaa ʋaazu ʋilisu,
É kpɔle, é yeema ná-baladai ma,
Laalao è ɓɔɛ, è naati maalobo, niiti ti la zooga ti ʋa ɓɔɛ,
Laalao è ɓɔɛ, è tukpɔi ɠaaleʋe ga telebodai,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naa, nii a anzanu zɔɓelamai zɔlɔɔ,
Sinigi laaʋɛ da,
É la ɗa ga kazemazu vaa nɔpɛ kɛ ga sinigi,
Toɠa ɗa baala deɠai ɠaiziɛ ta gezei,
Eɠɛ yaaɠo ɓatoi,
Toɠa ɗa wuzeɠe ga kpidiɓidigi,
É ɠisiɛ kpalagi ta zu, é geya,
Toɠa ɗa botii ɠɛ ga suvikɛi pɛ,
Toɠa pɛtɛsu ga zeavaiti su ɠa ɓɛtɛzu,
Toɠa ɗa kenagi zo ga yeei, é ɗa gezei ɓali,
Zeei maalegɛ maanɔɠɔ nuiti ta-ɓɔba vai ma,
É la lua kɔɔlɛ ʋa, é ʋilɛ ná-pɛlɛi ʋa,
Toɠa ɗa dasuzeɠeiti kpɛtɛ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi,
Sinigi ɠa ga seizumaanɛgi ɛsɛ pɛ ge kwɛɛ, ti ɗa unfe ma,
Toɠa ɗa seɠeiti fɛlɛ, é ɗa ti ʋɔdi,
Zɛbɛi ta unfemai, ta bɛ ga maaɠili zɔɔlai,
Toɠa ɗa ɓɔɛ ga ɠimalai,
Toɠa ɗa wɛlɛ fai kpein ma, é ziɛzu ná-pɛlɛyeɠei wu,
Ná-dointi ta ɗa wuzeɠe, ti ʋa ti ɗa maamusɛ.
É ɠɛ ma: «Anzanui mɔinʋɛ, ti-losuʋɛti bɔɔlɔai,
Zaalai ɠa ga yaava ani, padai ɠa ɗa leʋe,
À kpɔlɔzuʋɛ ma lɔnɔgi ve zea!
